text: Reston is a census-designated place in Fairfax County, Virginia. In 2018, Reston was ranked as the Best Place to Live in Virginia.Kerri Anne Renzulli and Sergei Khlebnikov, "This is the Best Place to Live in Every State," Money Magazine, January 26, 2018, http://time.com/money/5108196/best-places-to-live- every-state-us/ , accessed May 6, 2018. The U.S. Census Bureau said Reston's population to be 63,226. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Virginia
title: Reston, Virginia
